name: csharpfixformatfixed
description: Fix format of usings / indents / braces

csharpfixformat.sort.usings.enabled.description: Should usings be sorted or not.

csharpfixformat.sort.usings.order.description: Put namespaces in proper order. Values should be splitted with space.

csharpfixformat.sort.usings.splitGroups.description: Insert blank line between using blocks grouped by first part of namespace.

csharpfixformat.style.enabled.description: Enable code reformat with style options.

csharpfixformat.style.braces.onSameLine.description: Should open braces be kept on expression line (K&R style) or on new line.

csharpfixformat.style.braces.allowInline.description: Allow expressions inside braces at one line.

csharpfixformat.style.indent.preprocesso.description: Should preprocessor directives ignore indentation or use it.

csharpfixformat.style.indent.regionIgnor.description: Should #region / #endregion directives ignore indentation or use it.

csharpfixformat.style.indent.switchCaseI.description: Should switch cases ignore indentation or use it.

csharpfixformat.style.newline.atEnd.description: Force adds new empty line at end.

csharpfixformat.style.newline.elseCatch.description: Force places else / catch expression to new line.

csharpfixformat.style.newline.maxAmount.description: Amount of new line (\n) symbols allowed in row. 1 means no blank lines. Use 0 for disable.

csharpfixformat.style.operators.onSameLi.description: Should operators be kept on expression line or on new line for multilined expressions.

csharpfixformat.style.spaces.beforeIndex.description: Override spaces.beforeBracket rule for indexer sequence 'this['.

csharpfixformat.style.spaces.removeAfter.description: Remove spaces after specified command and before (. Commands should be splitted with space.
